BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS 021500Z TO 022130Z APR,

   22-58.72S 042-02.15W, 23-01.00S 042-00.00W,

2. CANCEL THIS MSG 042230Z APR.
